byin rlabs dbang// nga yis khyod la dbang bskur ro// rig pa ye shes me tog la// rin chen sna lngas spros byas te// gus pa'i tshul gyis zhu bar gyis// sgo lnga rigs lnga'i dbang bskur 'di// 'di bskur rang lus byin gyis rlobs// tshogs brgyad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dis// dbang bskur bde chen dngos grub thob// phung po lnga po rigs lnga yis// dbang bskur nges pa'i lha mchog thob// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di// ma bskur thob pa'i dbang ma yin// bskur bas rang byung ngo mtshar che// byin rlabs nus pa bsam mi khyab// dbang bskur thun mong ma yin no// lha dbang lus la bskur ba yis// lus byin brlabs pa'i dbang bskur yin// ye shes sku yi dkyil 'khor 'di// rang la shar ba ngo mtshar che// lha ni thun mong ma yin rang shar lha// rang shar phung po lnga po la// lha dbang lus la bskur ba yis// skye rga na 'chi bzhi las grol// grol ba rang byung ngo mtshar che// skye ba med pas 'chi las grol// na ba med pas rgas las grol// rang grol rang shar dbang mchog 'di// go 'phang dbang gis bgrod phyir gsungs// 'dir 'jug lam gyi mchog tu bshad// ye shes lnga yis ye nas khyab// khyab par rang byung ye shes sku// ye shes sku yi dbang bskur 'di// ye shes lus las rang shar ba// rang byung dbang bskur ngo mtshar che// a bi She ka u b+han d+he sha/ zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lha dbang lus la bskur ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ kye/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' lags// chos dbang sems la bskur ba bstan par zhu// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ dbang dang man ngag bshad pa ni// snod ldan ngang tshul ldan la bshad// dbang dang man ngag ma thob par// de ni ngal ba don med yin// dbang dang man ngag 'dod pa'i mis// srog lus 'phangs pa med par gtong// de ni dbang gi snod du rung// dbang ma thob pas chos 'chad pa// de yi lce la zhing rmo'o// dbang ma thob par sgom par byed// de ni phag tshod yid smon mkhan// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sngon yul yangs pa can gyi gnas// dngul gyi me long rang gdangs gling// skyes pa

bud med 'tshogs pa'i gnas// byad kyi lta ba'i gzhi ma byed// me long phyogs ris med pa la// rgad po rme ma rag sha gdong// byad bzhin spa la grub pas bltas// byad kyi rnam pa ma mthog bar// spu gri gang na 'dug pa de// de ga byad yin snyam nas 'dug/ rgan mo de yi rtsa shed na// khye'u chung mdzes pa kun ldan byung// me long bltas pas byad bzhin mthong// rgan mos bltas pas kho yi byad mthong bas// rgan mo'i byad la yid 'byung nas// kho yis byad la bltas pas su// rgan mo lto ma myong nas shi/ chos nyid me long g.ya' dag gsal// theg pa rim dgu rgan mo 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po khye'u chung 'dra// ma rig rgan mo long ma 'dra// dbang bskur khye'u chung mdzes ldan 'dra// lta ba rig pa rang rtsal dbang// nyan thos gang zag bdag med lta// rang rgyal chos kyi phyogs gcig lta// byang sems bden pa gnyis su lta// kre ya rje dang khol du lta// yo ga spun dang grogs por lta// mahA thabs dang shes rab lta// a nu dbyings dag ye shes lta// a ti yo ga phyogs med lta'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lta ba stong rdzogs dbang gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ kye kye ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' lags// sgom pa rig pa'i dbang zhu 'tshal// ces zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// nyan thos gzung 'dzin bkag nas ni// tshogs drug bkag nas sgom pa yin// phung po mi gtsang rus thigs bsgom// rang sangs rgyas kyi sgom pa ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'khor lo sgom// dbu ma dag gi sgom pa ni// sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bu sgom// kri ya rigs gsum mgon po bsgom// yo ga sku lnga'i dkyil 'khor sgom// mahA rigs lnga'i lha ru sgom// a nu rig pa'i lhar sgom pa'o// a nu yo ga sgom las 'das// bla na med pa'i thig le 'di// rin po che ni khong nas 'char// sgom sgrub rang la rang shar grol// nyan thos bdag med kho na spyod// rang sangs rgyas ni gnyis ka spyod// dbu ma pha rol phyin bcu spyod// kri ya 'phrin las rnam bzhi spyod// yo ga 'phrin las rnam bzhi spyod// ma hA sbyor sgrol spyod pa byed// a nu ma hA'i spyod pa'o// A ti snang srid gzhi bzhengs spyod// gsang ba yang gter spyod pa ni// 'dzin rgod bying rgod med pa yi// rang grol ye shes 'od gsal spyod// nyan thos 'bras bu dgra bcom pa// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni// ne tso bse ru lta bu'o// dbu ma'i 'bras bu spros mtha' bral// kri ya'i 'bras bu snang mtha' yas// yo ga tshe yi rig 'dzin thob// ma hA phyag rgya chen por 'dod// a nu rnam snang sa chen 'dod// bla na med pa'i thig le 'di// rgyu

'bras dbyer med thig le'i don// tshe gcig dag gis thob pa'o// ma hA ka ru lo ka ti la dz+nyA na A/ zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ grub mtha'i 'bras bus dbang bskur ba'i le'u dang/ theg pa'i sgo la 'chings pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' chen po lags// brtul zhugs dbang bskur gsung du gsol// ces zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gangs kyi rgyal po ti tse la// srog chags chen po bzhi gnas so// chu bo bzhi 'bab dbang gi brda// rgya mdud dbang gi dkyil 'khor na// shel gyi ga'u kha sbyar na// srog chags rnam bzhi dbang gi rtags// rtags dang don du 'brel ba yin// rin chen zur brgyad pho brang na// rig pa'i rgyal po zang thal gnas// brtul zhugs dbang gi don yin te// srog chags srog rtsa gcad pa gces// dbang rtags rang la yod kyis phyir ma tshol// brda don rnam gsum nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// don gsum rang la gnas pa ngo mtshar che// e ma rang shar ltad mo che// phyi nang gsang ba dbang gi brda// rang chas yin pas btsal du med// tshol na gser gyis gser tshol 'dra// tshol na shin tu rnyed par dka'// dbang rdzas dbang bskur thob lugs ni// nor bu rin chen gzhan gyi 'od 'phrog 'dra// rang la rang shar bas dbang gi rgyal po yin// rang gi thos pas dbang bskur rgyal po yin// dbang lnga shes rab rig pa ye shes dbang// lam du slongs na dbang lnga lhan cig skyes// de shes bar chad med pa'i brda ni bum nang mar me 'dra// dbang po rab kyi brda ni nyi shar dus tshod 'dra// 'bring dang tha ma'i brda bstan pa// nor bu rin chen skungs bcug 'dra// bar chad med na dbang gi rgyal po yin// rgyun mi 'chad pas dbang gi bskur thabs yin// a bi She ka na ma hUM/ zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ dbang gi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u las// bka' sgo dras thag gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// kye kye bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ bla mas thabs mang bstan pa ni// gang gi don du gsungs pa lags// nges pa'i don la gcig tu 'dus// sna tshogs bstan pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ngas ni thams cad gcig tu bstan// slob dpon tshad mar ma go dang// slob mas tshad mar ma go na// de ni bka' bsgo lam la 'chings// gdams ngag tshad dang ma ldan par// slob dpon tshad mar khas len dang// rdo la gser chu bskus pa 'dra// slob mas tshad mar ma shes pa// rtsa ba rul pa'i lo ma 'dra// 'bras bu smin

pa'i dus mi 'chi// lta ba stong pa'i rdzong la 'chings// lta ba nam mkha'i khungs tshol pa// 'bras bu skye mched mu bzhi las// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched gol// spyod pa cir snang thabs kyis 'chings// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi thag ma chod// 'bras bu 'khrig spyod lta ru gol// sgom pa nyams myong rtags kyis 'chings// blo snang nyams myong 'gyur bas ye shes don mi phrad// ye shes bsgoms pas mi 'char rang snang ngo sprod gces// 'bras bu rnam spyod dus kyi 'chings// 'bras bu yul can dus la ltos pa ni// 'bras bu thob dus mi 'ong sar chud// rang grol rang shar shes na 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin// bka' bsgo lam rgyus med pa'i slob dpon gyis// rna bar shub shub slu bar byed// gdams pa tshad mar ma phyin pas// long bas long ba khrid pa 'dra// 'jug sgo theg pas 'chings pa ni// rims brgyad kun brtags 'jug pa'i sgo// tshul khrims sdom pa dam tshig la sogs kyis// rang rang grub mtha' 'chings nas phyogs ltos byed// nam mkha' gung du gcad pa'i phyogs ris can// de yi grub mthas 'chings pa gol// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ 'ching ba drug gi gdams ngag bstan pa ste le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' lags// 'chings pa'i dras thag gcad pa bstan par zhu// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lta ba'i rkun bus khyer ba'i mi// dper na nam mkha' stong ba la// phyogs bcu gcad nas sgrub par byed// nam mkha' phyogs med rang shar la// phyogs ris gcad nas rkun bus khyer// stong pa nyid ni khas len pa// dngos po ma shong phyogs ltos byed// rdzogs chen khas len stong nyid can// dbu ma'i lta ba'i rkun bus khyer// rdzogs chen rol ba'i don ma rtogs// stong nyid phyi dus 'debs pa ni// 'bras bu'i dras thag ma chod pas// thig ler rang snang sgrib pa yis// 'bras bu rang grol dus mi 'chi// de na dras thag gcad pa ni// snang srid rang grol rang shar 'di// gol sgrib gnyis kyi don rtogs pas// dbu ma'i don rtogs rdzogs chen yin// phyogs med shar nas rang grol yin// ye shes rin chen 'bar ba 'di// khong nas shar bar 'bras bu'i dras thag chod// 'bras bu'i dras thag ma chod na// phyogs rtogs 'bras bu thob mi srid// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lta ba'i rkun bu ngos gzung ba dang dras thag gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ kye/ gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' lags// sgom pa'i rkun bu ji ltar lags// de yi dras thag ji

ltar gcad// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sgom pa'i nyams len bstan pa ni// rlung gi shas che rgod cing 'tshub// 'phro dang rgod pa'i rkun bu 'ong// rang bzhin shugs kyi rgod pa dang// ched du byas dang rten 'brel rdzas kyi rgod// nying gung mtshan gung bsgom par bya// rten 'brel rdzas dang dus tshod dang// stong nyid thun tshad dbye ba gces// bad kan shas che lci zhing bying// rang bzhin shugs kyis bying ba dang// ched du byas dang rten 'brel rdzas// nyin dgung mtshan gung bor byas la// srod dang tho rangs thun tshad dang// 'od gsal thun tshad khams dang sbyar// rten 'brel man ngag 'brel pa gces// mkhris pa shas che ba yang brtan// bsam gtan phyogs med 'phel ba'i yin// rdzas dang rte 'brel thun tshad ni// rab tu snyoms pas 'grub pa'o// khrag gi shas che shes rab che// bsam gtan gang yang 'phel 'gyur te// grang ba'i rdzas dang thun tshad gces// 'dus pa'i rang bzhin kun nas snyoms// stong nyid ye shes rang bzhin 'chang// rdzas dang thun tshad dbye bar bya// nga bdag zhi ba'i sgom pa yin// thig le khas len nyan thos gol// sgom pa'i rkun bu spyod kun yin// de yis dras thag gcad pa ni// ye shes blo las grol ba ni// phyi nang dbyer med zang thal la// sgom pa ni nad kyi rkun bus khyer// 'bras bu skye mched mu bzhir skye// 'bras bu'i rkun pa zhes su bshad// thig le ngo sprod zang thal 'di// gzhi lam 'bras bu dbyer med pas// nyag gcig sgom pa'i blo las grol// rten 'brel rdzas la rag ma lus// rang grol ye shes rang la shar// e ma rang snang chen po 'di// rtsol sgrub nad dang ma bral na// ji ltar sgom pas 'dus byas yin// thig le rang sgo ngo sprad pas// sgom mkhan sgom yul 'bras bu gsum// rang grol nyid du mkhyen pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i rkun bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' chen// dbus kyi ri rab gling bzhi gling phran brgyad// ri bdun mtsho bdun shing chen lnga// lcags ri nag po ji ltar 'khrul// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// gzhi la chos lnga ldan pa yin// lam du 'od lngar 'khrul pa yin// 'bras bu rin chen sna lngar 'khrul// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru 'khrul// kha dog ser po ri bdun 'khrul// dkar po rol mtsho bdun du 'khrul// dkar po shar sogs gling du 'khrul// mthing ka lcags ri nag por 'khrul// chos lnga shing chen lnga ru

'khrul// rang snang 'khrul pa shar ba la// phyogs dang gling du phye ba yin// des na rang gdangs 'khrul par shar// phyi yi snod kyi cha lugs so// 'od zer dkar po grang ba'i snod// 'od zer ljang khu nyi tshe'i snod// mthing ka rdo rje dmyal ba'i snod// 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje 'dra// mthing ka byol song snod du shar// ser po mi yi snod du shar// ljang khu lha dang lha ma yin// phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'khrul pa yin// rang gdangs 'khrul pa ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i mchog/ nang gi grub tshul bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum du 'khrul pa'i don// gzhi ni chen po lnga ru gnas// phyi ltar lhun grub nang ltar chos nyid la// gsang ba kun gzhi spyi sa yin// lam du rang gdangs 'od du shar// 'bras bu phung po lnga ru shar// de ni rang gdangs nang gi yul du grub pa'i ri rab 'khrul// gling bzhi mthil bzhi gling phran rkang chen brgyad// ri bdun mtsho bdun tshogs bdun snang ba bdun// shing lnga sgo lnga lcags ri bags par 'khrul// de ni nang gi grub tshul yin// gsang ba'i grub tshul bstan pa ni// dbus kyi ri rab tsit+ta la// gling bzhi mthil bzhi gling brgyad thel brgyad don// ri bdun thel bdun mtsho bdun zur// shing lnga rtsa lnga lcags ri snying// rtsa nag chen po yin par bshad// yang gsang grub tshul bstan pa ni// rtsa yi rgyal po ri rab la// rtsa bzhi rtsa brgyad gling phran brgyad// chags sdang drug dang ngo bo ni// ri bdun yin par rag gdangs so// drug drug ngo bo bdun ni mtsho// gti mug 'byed med ma rig lcags// sgo lnga rtsa lnga shing du 'khrul ba'o// me long snang bzhi spyi sogs bzhi// phyi yi sgo lnga mngon du shar// nang gi sgo lnga snying la grub// gsang ba'i sgo lnga rtsa ru shar// yang gsang sgo ni 'gyur ba'i mig/ mdzod tshang g.yos cha rgan rgon bu rmad tshang// tshang bang mun khang zhes su bshad// yul dang srid pa kun gsal na// me long gcig la 'od byung bas// phyogs med 'od kyis khengs pa ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang grub tshul gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// gsang ba'i bdag po la zhus pa// thog ma gling bzhi chags lugs las// phyi snod grub pa de ltar na// mi dang glang sogs go mtshon dang// nor gyi rnam pa ji ltar grub// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mi la

rgyal po blon po dang// dmangs dang bram ze mi rigs lnga// rgyal po rin chen rgyal po rigs// blon po rin chen blon po'i rigs// thams cad 'phel byed btsun mo rin po che// glang po rin po che las byol song sogs// thams cad 'byung bas glang po rin po che// dmag dpon rin po che las grub pa ni// ma blas phub dang ma brdungs mtshon// ma rgyus khrab la sogs pa 'byung bas rin po che// rta mchog cang shes rin chen rta mchog grub// nor bu rin po che las nor gyi tshogs rnams grub// rdzas rnams kun gyi mchog tu bshad// bcud du grub pa rin chen sna bdun yin// 'khor lo rin po che las 'gro drug 'khrul pa'o// rarna lo ka karma bu d+ha spra sa ra da du/ zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ bcud bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa// kye kye rdo rje sems dpa' lags// rnal 'byor bar chod 'byung pa la// de yi bzlog thabs ji ltar lags// 'chi ltas rnam pa du zhig mchis// zhes zhus pa// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// 'chi ltas rnam pa gsum yin te// bar chad gdon dang 'dus pa nad// las kyi rnam smin gsum du bstan// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor bar chod bzlog pa dang// 'chi ba slu ba bstan par bya// de la dang po bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor 'dre ni rlung la 'jug ba spu'i bu ga'i khung bu nas// rlung yang de dang 'dra bar rgyu// bug pa dgu yi rlung dgu nas// rnam shes rlung yang dgu rgyug ste// rlung la 'dre zhon nad du 'gyur// dmar na btsan dang ma mo'i gdon// mthing na bdud dang nag mo'i gdon// ser na dmu dang bsen mo'i gdon// dkar na rgyal po dkar gdon// ljang na 'dre gdon sna tshogs so// steng rlung 'og rlung rang las grub// 'dre lnga rlung lnga rang las grub// bcos thabs so so'i sgo ru bstan// nud pan ni ka zhes gsungs so// tsan dan gyi nags tshal la me tog ha lo la sad byung ste// slar gso ba'i brda bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ bar chod gdon ngos gzung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lags// 'dus pa'i nad kyis 'chi ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// nad la bsam gyi mi khyab ste// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang// rtogs pa brgya dang brgyad cu la// de la nad rnams 'jug par byed// bsdus pas 'byung ba lnga yi nad// ser na mkhris pa dmar na tsha ba nad// mthing na bad kan dkar na rlung// ljang na 'dus pa'i nad yin te// 'byung ba lnga yi khams dang sbyar// rgyu dang rkyen

las bcos thabs rdzas sbyor gces// so so rang re'i gnyen po sbyor bas bcos// 'dus pa nad kyis 'chi ba bslu ba yin// gangs dkar gyi rtse mo la// u dum wa ra'i sad bsrung ba'i man ngag/ brda dang don gyis bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// 'dus pa nad kyi 'chi ltas kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa// kye/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' lags// las kyi rnam smin 'chi ba yi// bar do ngan 'gro 'khor bas na// de yi gdams ngag bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bar do'i 'bras bu bzlog pa ni// rin po che'i za ma tog 'od 'bar ba de la/ thob shas byas pas nam sros mun rum du chud de 'gro bas/ bar do'i rin chen sna lnga'i me mar bteg pa'i brda// drod dang yi ge mdog gsum po// dkar po rkang mthil yi ge du// dmyal ba 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// dmar po gsang ba'i yi ge bri// yi dwags 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// mthing ka lte ba yi ge su// byol song 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// ser po snying kha yi ge Ni// mi ru 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// ljang nag mgrin pa'i yi ge a// mi ma yin gyi snga ltas yi// spyi bo ljang khu yi ge a// lha ru 'gro ba'i snga ltas so// dmyal ba tsha grang sdug bsngal dang// yi dwags bkres skom gyis gdungs pa// byol song glen lkugs chos byol nas// lha ma yin gyi rtsod 'gyur dang// lha yi gnas nas lhung bas na// mi yi rgyu rkyen bstan par bya// 'bras bu nges par thob par 'gyur// rgyu rkyen gdams bas 'chi ltas gdab// yul 'od zer can gyi ldum ra na/ gser gyi mchod rten skur bzhugs pa'i brda bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ rnam smin bzlog pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ snang ba sgyur thabs med pa ji ltar lags// de yi brda don gsung du gsol// ces zhus so// ston pa rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ sngon byung ba'i spos ri zhes bya ba na/ rin po che sna lnga'i 'od yod pa la/ cang shes kyi rta la zhon nas brgyugs pas/ myur mgyogs kyi rta kha ma thub nas mun pa smag gi brag phug tu chud do// bar do snang ba bsgyur thabs med pa ni// mtshams med lnga byas rdo rje slob dpon bsad// snang ba bzlog pa'i thabs med de// dper na ri bo'i rtse mo nas// 'od zer phyogs med 'char ba la// sus kyang khegs par gal 'gyur// mnar med rang snang rang la shar ba de// gzhan gyis bzlog tu rang byung ci la zlogs// 'chi ltas ma byung bar du ngo sprod byas gyur na// mnar med de yi snang ba chos

min thig ler 'bar// 'bar ba'i rgyal po rin chen khong nas 'char// zhes gsungs so// skyes bu gyad pa gcod byed bya bas// btsun mo legs mo cig la mda' btsugs pas/ mdas btsun mo zang thal du song nas bsad do// de ngo mtshar che/ thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ snang ba bsgyur du mi btub pa dang rnam smin ngo sprod pas grol ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' lags// thun mong 'chi ltas de ltar lags// khyad par 'chi rtsis bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// khyad par 'chi ltas bstan pa ni// yul khyab byed 'byung ba'i me long du// sprin sna tshogs snang ba'i gzugs can la// drang srong gi chad pa gsal ba ni// kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi 'od// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi mdangs// dga' rab rdo rjes lung bstan te// sa dang nam mkha' gnyis la brtag/ mkha' la bag rdul med pas dus// dngul gyi gzhong pa lta bu yi// de yi nang na rang gdangs gsal// mdog skya rang gis grib ma brtag/ grib ma rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dus pa nad dang bar chad gdon// las kyi rnam par smin pa'o// de rnams go rim ji bzhin du// mtshan ma rtags kyi rang gdangs la// rang dang 'khor gyi rtags bstan te// nyin mo nub lta mtshan mo shar// zla ba nyi ma'i grib ma brtag/ de tshe maN+Dal ma byas na// cho 'phrul log par 'gyur// de nas gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// maN+Dal pu tsa ma ha ho// zhes gsungs so// 'dre rgyud chen po las/ sngon du bya ba bstan pa ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa kun gyi rje// grib ma'i mtshan ma bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// grib ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// ljon shing phung po rgyas pa la// yal ga sdong po so so gyes// gyes pa slar la bsdu ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i me long bstan pa ni// dngul gyi mtsho mo gser gyi nya mo'i lus brtags pas// dga' rab rdo rje lung bstan pa// ro bltums 'dra na zla gcig na// rnal 'byor pa ni brlag par 'gyur// mgo mjug log na gnyis na 'chi// mgo bo chad na gsum na 'chi// gdugs sogs po ti mtshan ma brtags// slob dpon slob ma 'chi bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pa chad pa na// pha spun ma spun bzhi nas 'chi// lag pa g.yon pa chad gyur na// bu dang chung ma bzhi na 'chi// rkang pa g.yas pa chad gyur na// ma dang bu mo sring mo dag/ bzhi na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// rkang pa g.yon pa chad gyur na// pha spun mo dang ma spun mo// zla ba bzhin nas

'chi bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// rang gdangs brtags pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyis su// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// gdon dang nad dang rnam smin gsum// de yi rang gdangs bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gdon gyi gdangs bstan pa ni// brda dang don du bstan par bya/ khyab brdal mthing gi me long du// 'od kha dog lnga rang gdangs su gsal lo// de la bltas na rang gi lus dngos su ston no// de la 'dre dag zhugs 'gyur na// 'dra 'bag dkar dmar sna lnga yis// rang srog rang gi gcod 'gyur bas// 'bag de ngo yis gzung bar bya// ngos zin de la mdos bsngos la// srog gi glud ni sbyin byas nas// 'bag de dngos su mkha' la 'gro// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'bag bslus yin// me yi 'bag ni dmar po des// rang gdangs lus la khyab byas nas// mgo bo la sogs go rim bzhin// 'bag gi gdon de mthong ba na// rdo rje klu btsan smug mos ni// rang gi srog la bar chad byed// de bzhin phaspun la sogs brtags// nam mkha'i 'dra 'bag mthing ka dag/ mgo la sogs pa go rim bzhin// bdud dang nag mos srog la rku// de yang gong du shes par bya// 'chi bdag bdud de gsal bar bya// chu yi 'bag ni dkar po dag/ mgo bo la sogs lus la zhugs// go rims bzhin du rab tu brtag/ rgyal po dkar mo'i gdon du bstan// sa yi 'bag ni ser po dag/ lus la sogs pa'i gdon du bsal// de yis bar du gcod pa na// dmu dang ser mor shes par bya// rlung gi 'bag ni ljang khu dag/ mgo lus dag la zhugs pa gsal// de ni spyi bdud bar chod yin// sna tshogs 'dre ru shes par bya// bar chod gdon gyi bcos thabs dang// rten 'brel rdzas kyi bcos thabs gces// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ gdon ngos gzung ba'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// las kyi rnam smin bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rang dang don gyi ngo sprod bstan par bya// rang snang rnam dag me long la// btsun mo mdzes ma sna tshogs mdog/ de yis bstan pa'i dus gcig na// mo yi rang gis mdangs stor bas// sus kyang mi rnyed brlags par 'gyur// las kyi me long gsang ba nang// srid pa 'byung ba'i lus po gsal// rtag tu ltas na cho 'phrul mthong// ma ltas bar chad zlog mi 'gyur// des na brtag pa rab tu gces// lus kyi rang

gdangs mi snang na// maN+Dal mchod pa phul la blta// des ni gsal bar ma nus na// lus kyi mtha' ni zad pa yin// tshe zad par ni shes par bya// ngo sprod dbang bskur bya bar shis// de ltar ma byas 'khor bar 'khyam// 'khrul 'khor rang grol rang snang yin// rang grol rang byung rang shar ba'i// gnad kyi dam pa shes par gyis// sngon mkha' gsal ba'i nang na bdud ha li ka ngo bzhin de// kho'i snang ba g.yu'i me long la gsal te/ dus dus dag tu lta ba la/ dus nam zhig na kho'i ngo bzhin de/ bdud srid pa'i ngo bzhin gyis khyer bas/ kho mya ngan gyis zin kyang phan med do// de la mya ngan gyis mi phan pa ngo mtshar che/ ma lha nud ti sha ha a/ zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ las kyi rnam smin bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs kyis// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// 'chi ba bslu ba gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// zab mo brda yi ngo sprod bstan par bya// nyi zla gnyis la rtse nus na// 'chi ba bslu bar gdon mi za// drang srong chen po nye nag de// rang gi dngul dkar me long la// nang nub gnyis su blta ba la// kho yi byad la 'dre gdon zhugs// 'dre de bslu bar bya ba ni// lta ba'i stobs kyis bslu ba dang// spyod pa'i stobs kyis bslu ba dang// sgom pa'i stobs kyis bslu ba dang// rten 'brel rdzas kyis bslu ba 'o// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs rnams nyon// gangs dkar rtse yi seng ge la// rtsal gsum rdzogs pas sder chags zil gyis mnan// zin gnon stobs kyi 'dre de bslu// rin chen thig le rang 'bar la// bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum zil gyis mnan// zil gnon stobs kyis lta ba ni// rgyu rkyen med pas chos min yin// phyi nang med par thig le'i don// rang grol ye shes 'bras bu ste// gnyis med ye shes thig le la// gnyis snang gdon gyis 'dre de bslus// chos las ma byung 'bras bu yang// mi srid srid pa'i chos yin no// kun bzang slob dpon ma brten pa// mi srid srid pa'i sangs rgyas yin// dmyal ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal sogs// rang grol shes pas sangs rgyas pa// mi srid srid pa'i chos min yin// sdug bsngal sangs rgyas rang snang ba// mi srid srid pa'i ye shes yin// khyung chen gzan ma mi dgos pa// mi srid srid pa'i srog chags yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lta ba'i bslu ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// rdo rje sems dpa' kun rig rje// spyod pa'i stobs kyis bslu ba gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo

rje mkha' 'gro ma// rma bya rgyal po gser 'od kyis// ma zos pa yi zas med pas// dug la kham gcig za ma myong// lan cig nags khrod gnas su phyin// dug gi rgyal po ha lo de// kha dog lnga dang ldan nas 'dug/ de la kham gcig zos pa dang// rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de// spu kha lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// rang skad kring kring sod ces bya// de nas rma bya'i rgyal mo yis// dug gi rgyal po de la zos// rang skad gdangs dang chas pa yis// rma bya rgan rgon gsos su gyur// dug gis 'tsho ba'i rma bya rnams// de yang mi srid srid pa'i chos// zhes gsungs so// theg pa'i rgyal po 'dre rgyud 'dis// grub mtha'i rgyal por rang shar bstan// spyod pa'i rgyal po dug lnga rang shar la// lam gyi rgyal po rang shar rang grol bstan// nyams kyi rgyal po snang srid thig ler brdal// 'dod chags zhe sdang rang rgyud grags su 'gyur// theg brgyad kun brtags rnams ni dug lnga spong// theg chen rgyal po 'di ni mnyams nyid grogs su 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ spyod pa'i stobs kyis bslu ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// sgom pas bslu ba gsung du gsol// ces zhus so// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drang srong dur khrod dag na gnas pa la// stag dang dom gyis mi sdug byas// drang srong snying rlung zhugs nas ni// de nas sman pa btsal ba las// sman pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu khugs// snying rlung can de'i sman du ni// sman chen lnga po gcig tu sbyar// drang srong de la gtang ba las// snying rlung zhi nas bde ba skyes// bde ba'i nyams kyis gzung ba ni// rgod drug rnyi la zin pa 'dra// sgom pa'i stobs kyis bslu ba ni// rig pa drang tshugs bde gsal de// zhe sdang gti mug bsgom par bya// rlung gis bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir// rlung gzung bde ba bsgom par bya// dug lnga rang gsal mi rtog sgom// ma rig rlung ni zhi gnas rlung la gnas// rlung zin pas ni bslus par 'gyur// phyi rlung glod la nang rlung bsdam// mkha' la gtad pas rtog pa zhi// zhi gnas bsgoms pas bslu bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// sgom pas bslu ba'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// rten 'brel rdzas kyis bslu ba bstan par zhu// zhes zhus so// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rten 'brel rdzas kyi bslu ba ni// mi rta khyi yi rus pa la// rang gi dri mas byugs nas ni// ngar glud khru gang tshad du bya// gang gi gos kyang de la bskon// sa

phyogs rgya gram dag tu ni// khung bu brus te sba bar bya// mi de 'chi ba zlog par 'gyur// de yis rang gdangs ma gsal na// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa bya// des kyang thub par ma gyur na// tshogs kyi 'khor los bslus par 'gyur// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang bas kyang// 'chi ba bslus par 'gyur pa yi// tsha tshwa 'bum du btab pas kyang// 'chi bas bslus par 'gyur ba yin// chu yi gtor ma 'bum btang na// des kyang bslus par 'gyur ba yin// de rnams dag gis ma bslus ni// las kyi rnam par smin pa yin// rnam smin rtags de gong du shes// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ 'chi ba sbyor bas bslu ba'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' lags// 'pho ba'i gdams ngag gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'pho ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// sku gsum rang lugs shes nas ni// rab ni skad cig gsum la 'pho// dbugs chad pa yi skad cig ma// rang snang shar ba'i skad cig ma// mngon du gyur ba'i skad cig ma// rang grol 'ub chud skad cig ma// dus bzhi mnyam par sbyar nas ni// rab kyis 'pho ba'i dus yin te// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// dus bzhi rang grol dgongs pa'i mchog/ skad cig rnam pa bzhi po de// mthun pa kri ya'i tshul tsam yin// rang shar rang grol 'du 'bral med// 'ub chub byang chub klong du gsal// thig ler brtsegs pa'i rtse mor phyin// sa rnams ma bgrod rang sar sleb// lam rings ma sbyangs rang sa non// 'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes shar// dbang po rab kyi 'pho ba yin// dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab de// rin chen sna lngar shar ba yis// mun pa bya ba yul na med// nyi zla zung gcig 'du 'bral med// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ dbang po rab kyi 'pho ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus ba// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' lags// 'bring po'i 'pho ba bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rin chen gser gyi bum pa ni// zhugs mar 'bar ba rtag tu gsal// gser gyi bum pas zhun mar bsgribs// kha phye bltas na zhun mar gsal// nang gsal phyi mi gsal ba la// bum pa'i gzer bu chad pa dang// phyi rol 'od kyi snang bas khebs// brda yi rtags ni 'di lta ste// phyi lus bum pa'i nang shed na// rang rig thig le rtag tu gsal// rang lus bum pa'i rang snang bsgribasam// gdams ngag thebs pas

mthong bar 'gyur// blo yi pad+ma kha phye nas// don gyi ye shes rtag tu gsal// thig le ye shes khong gsal yin// dbugs chad pa yi dus nyid na// bar dor rang gdangs 'od du gsal// 'od de longs sku 'gyu ba sprul pa'i sku// gnyis med rang shar shes pa chos kyi sku// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par 'bab// bar ma do ru sangs rgyas pas// 'pho ba zhes su bshad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ dbang po 'bring po'i 'pho ba'i le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tha ma'i 'pho ba bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// tha ma'i 'pho ba bstan pa ni// drang srong gcig dang bram ze gnyis// kho yi yul na bde chen gling// de na nor bu rin chen yod// drang srong yul ni skyo med yin// de ru gnyis po tshogs pa las// bram zes drang srong rgad po la// nor bu rin chen gtam byas pas// drang srong nor bu'i mching bu la// yid byung kho la nga khrid byas// bram ze dag gi zhal na re// nga ni sna la 'gro ba yin// khyod ni phyogs nas 'od dgos zer// yid ches pa yi rtags dgos byas// nga yi yum gyi drang lam na// 'jig rten zam pa kun rgyu yod// de yi zam pa'i dkyil du ni// nor bu rin chen sbas la bzhag/ de mthong bas ni nga dang 'phrad// ces brda ru gsungs so// slob ma slob dpon rnam pa gnyis// sangs rgyas sa dang 'khor ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas yon tan 'khor ba'i skyon// dbyer med yin te ngo ma phrad// snga ma phyi ma gnyis su gzung// 'di dang bar do gnyis su bstan// bar do sems can thams cad 'grim// 'od lnga'i zam la thams cad 'byung// sku gsum ngo sprod shin tu gces// des shes pas ni mngon sangs rgyas// rig pa 'gyu bar ngo sprad pas// 'gyu ba'i rlung ni sprul sku yin// 'od kyi gdangs ni longs sku yin// dbyer med rang snang chos kyi sku// gzer gsum btab pas rang sar grol// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i rtse mor phyin// mu mtha' med cing khyab brdal lo// nor bu rin chen gling du sleb// zhe 'dod mdud pa de ru grol// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// dbang po tha ma'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// ngo sprod ma byas ji ltar 'pho// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'od lus yid lus sha khrag lus// rang rang rgyu mthun las kyi 'pho// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen gyis 'pho// nyi ma stong bas gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor de// 'ug rtsogs mig la mun mthong 'dra// thag pa sbrul 'dzin rang gdangs

so// rgad po gter stengs nyal te ltogs drir shi/ rgan mo grong kha 'grims kyang 'grangs ma myong// bu tshas stong khams 'phyos kyang ltad mo'i thag ma chod// rgod po rnyil zil pa ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// ngo sprod ma byas pa 'khor bar khyams pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// de ltar 'gro ba'i gdams ngag de// srid pa lags sam ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rang gdangs mkha' la snang ba de// mi srid srid pa'i chos cig yin// rang 'dre dngos su ston pa de// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// sdig ma byas par 'khor ba de// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// dge ba ma byas mtho ris thob// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// chos ma byas par sangs rgyas pa// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// bskyed rim ma byas longs sku de// mi srid pa yi srid pa yi// slob dpon med pa'i ston pa de// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// rtogs pas chog pa'i byin rgyud 'di// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// sgom pa byas pas 'khor bar 'khyams// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// rtogs pas grol ba'i ngo sprod la// dge sdig gnyis kyis phan gnod med// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// sa yi me mar stong btang kyang// nyi ma dag la stong ma nus// rgya mtsho'i steng du dar chags kyang/ chu las 'das pa rdul tsam med// dug lnga'i sdong po rang rig kyang// rtogs pas dug lnga grogs su 'gyur// shing phung che na me phung che// gzung 'dzin che na rtogs pa sla// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// khyung phrug mngal thon ma dang mnyam// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// seng phrug mngal 'tshar ma dang mnyam// mi srid pa yi srid pa yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// rtogs sgom khyad par gyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// srid pa lus kyi chags lugs bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sngon tshe dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab te// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su srid// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// rgya mtsho chen po'i steng du byung// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// 'og gi rgya mtsho'i gting du srid// srid pa rang snang zhes su bshad// kha dog lnga las grub pa'i ri// sra sra 'dra ste 'jig pa yin// las kyi rlung dang nyi ma yis// skad cig tsam la brlag par 'gyur// de ni brda yi bshad pa'o// don ni 'di ltar shes par gyis// 'gyu ba kun gzhi'i dbus nas 'khrul// kha dog lnga las grub pa'i

lus// kun gzhi dag las gnas bcas nas// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i lus// pha dang ma yi thig le de// dang po mdzod spu'i bu gar chags// de las rtsa gnyis chags pa ni// rang snang me long gnyis su shar// de las rtsa gnyis gyes pa ni// kun gzhi'i dbus su grub pa yin// stod na rtsa phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong brda// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// rang las shar bar bstan pa yin// smad nas rtsa bran brgyad khri bzhi stong shar// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// rang byung 'khor ba'i brda ru shar// stod smad gnyis su shar ba yang// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi brda ru bsnan// stong du sgo dgur shar ba yang// theg dgu rang la grub pa'i brda// rtsa yi 'then thag bcu gcig kyang// bcu gcig sa rnams bgrod du med pa'i brda// mgrin gnas rtsa chen bcu drug kyang// bcu drug sa rnams rang la rdzogs pa'i brda// kha sna gsum gyi rtsa ru 'dug pa ni// dbugs kyi rgyun srang gcig yin pas// theg dgu gsum 'dus ngo bo gcig/ rtsa gsum 'du 'bral med par 'khril// sku gsum spyan gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i brda// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// lus kyi rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsol pa// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum rdzogs lugs bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gangs ri brtsegs pa'i rtse mo na// srog chags rgyal po seng ge de// rtsal gsum lus la rdzogs par gnas// sder chags mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// u dum 'bar ba zas su za// nyin mo mtshan mo ming ma thogs// ltogs 'khyags gnyis ni ma grub bo// um dum 'bar ba zas kyi cho ga/ gangs dkar brtsegs pa gnas kyi mchog/ seng ge dkar mo srog chags mchog/ ces brda bstan pa'o// spyi bo bde chen gzhal yas khang// klad pa gangs ri brtsegs pa'i steng// de yi dbus na chos min rgyal po'i thig le gnas// sku gsum rang grol bde chen rdzogs// gzugs sku gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa bzhi la// thig le chos min khyab cing brdal// khyab brdal chen po'i 'khor lo yin// phyi nang med dpas chos min sku// gnyis med zang thal 'ub chub sku// snang zhing srid pa rnam dag pas// 'khor bar rang grol chos las min// bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes zang thal bdud rtsi'i mchog/ thig le chos min 'bras bu'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// thig le chos min rang la rdzogs pa'i le'u ste so drug

pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' lags// longs sku'i rdzogs lugs bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dug gi dpon po ha la'i tshal// nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon gnas mchog na// rma bya rgyal po rab dga' gnas// spu kha lba dang rab tu ldan// ha la 'bar ba'i sngags btab za// srog chags rgyal po rma bya yi// zas kyi rgyal po bong nga yin// gnas kyi rgyal po ha la'i tshal// 'khor ni rma bya rnams kyis bskor// ces brda bstan pa'o// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na// dug lnga'i khang bzangs bya ba'i gnas// ston pa'i rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' gnas// kha dog lnga yi bdag nyid can// dug lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// longs sku'i rgyal po rang chas yin// lam gyi rgyal po dug lnga yin// gnas kyi rgyal po longs spyod 'khor lo yin// rtsa chen bcu drug sems dpa' sems ma yin// longs sku sgom pas yid smon 'dus byas yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ longs sku rdzogs lugs kyi le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// sprul sku'i rdzogs lugs bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// legs par nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// rgya mtsho chen po'i klong dkyil na// brag dang gangs kyi sa mtshams su// 'dab chags rgyal po khyung chen gnas// zas kyi rgyal po klu chen za// 'khor kyang klu za mang pos bskor// mtsho bran drug gi dbus shed na// srid pa drug gi mtsho dkyil na// khyung gi rgyal po de na bzhugs// ngo mtshar che ste mthong ba nyung// zhes gsungs so// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// kun gzhi srid pa'i mtsho mo la// snying ga rin chen zur brgyad na// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das sbyor ba// 'gag pa med pa'i shes rab shar// nyams myong rgyal po ye shes rlung// sprul sku thugs phrad thams cad gsal// thub pa drug gi gtso bo ste// kun gzhi phyogs med zang thal na// thig le zang thal rang gsal gnas// ye shes rlung gis 'thor bar 'gyur// rtsa brgyad thig le'i yon tan las// thig le ye shes brgyad gnas so// 'bras bu rang shar ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ sprul pa sku'i rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// sku gsum 'brel ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sngon yul yangs pa can zhes bya ba na// srid

pa'i rgyal mo me long gdong zhes bya ba gser gyi nor bu rin po che rgyan sna tshogs 'phro ba cig yod de/ de la ming btags pas/ srid pa'i mun sel 'od 'bar ba zhes bya bar btags so// dus nam zhig na nyi ma nub pas/ nor bu la nyi ma stong shar bas/ mun pa smag rung grol lo// zhes brda bstan to// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// kun gzhi rin chen dpe dang 'dra// chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum// nyi ma 'od dang zer bzhin gsal// 'du 'bral med pa'i byin rlabs brgyud// bde chen mdzod na snying po gnas// de yi zer la longs skur gnas te mgrin// de yi 'od las sprul sku snying// rtsa yi rgyal po rten gyi thag pas sbrel// rang chas sku gsum ngo sprod bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ sprul sku rdzogs lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// de ltar ma rig ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sngon yul yangs pa'i dur khrod du// rgan mo long ma gcig la rta rlung gi gshog pa can bya ba cig yod pas/ sngar rgan mos zhon te 'ongs pas// rgan mos rta ma thub nas rgan mo phyi'i rgya mtshor bskyal lo// der rgan no sdug bsngal gyis zin no// zhes brda bstan pa'o// kun gzhi 'phrul gyi me long nas// ma rig pa yi 'dzin pa rgyas// srid gsum rlung gis rta pos bskyod// srid gsum rtsa ba de ru smin// rlung ngo ma shes 'khor ba smin// sdug bsngal chu bo gzhung dang 'dra// lte bug rtsa dang gsang ba'i rtsa// 'og sgo'i rtsa ni brgyad khri dang// bzhi stong dag tu srid pas na// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong smin// gsang ba'i bug pa gsum shar ba// ngan 'gro rnam gsum sgo ru shar// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ ngan 'gro rang lus la ngo sprod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa// sgra yi gdams pa gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sgra yi don ni 'di lta ste// sngon yul gsal ldan zhes bya ba na// rgyal po gcig la rin po che'i 'phreng ba gcig yod pas/ de la ngo sprad na dgos dgu 'byung ngo// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ a ma Ta tha Da Na/ dz+ha bai hUM b+he/ de la sgra phyi ltar bshad pa dang/ nang ltar bshad pa dang/ gsang ba ltar bshad pa dang/ rang gi ngo bo ltar bshad pa'o// de yang sgra'i dbyings dang/ sgra'i sgrub byed dang/ sgra phan pha'i rkyen can dang// sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma'o// zhes gsungs

so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// sgra 'dus pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la// sgra yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdzo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ka ni sku gsung 'byung ba'i sgra// 'phrin las kun gyi bdag po bsgrub// sku gsum yin pa de sel// yi ge zhe gnyis dbyings su bshad// grogs ni 'dogs dang gong 'og btsan// sgrub byed sku gsum 'du 'bral med// mthun rkyen nyi ma'i snying po'o// a ni skye ba med pa sgrub// dbyings ni yi ge rtsa bzhi po// phan pa'i rkyen ni bzhi stong ngo// bsgrub bya rang gi so la bzhag/ gzhan sel skye ba can du bshad// ma ni mnyam nyid chen pos sgrub// mi mnyam pa yi sgra dag sel// grogs ni rang gi 'dogs las shes// dbyings ni yi ge'i 'khor lor shes// shas ni shes rab sgrub par byed// shes rab ma yin gzhan sel te// phan pa'i rkyen ni gong 'og ltos// dbyings ni gong du shes par bya// has ni thig le 'gag med sgrub// mi 'gag pa yi thig le sel// grogs dang dbyings ni gong du bstan// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ gzhi'i yi ge'i 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la// sgra yi lhag ma gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ka kha la sogs pa thams cad kyang// dbyings ni rang rang tshom bu gcad// sgrub byed 'a mos 'bod pa yin// phan rkyen 'dogs kyis shes par gyis// gzhan sel gnod pa mi mthun pa// yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga dang// kha yar yi ge drug po ni// dbyings kyi khyud nas ran tu 'brel// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las// ka kha la sogs rkyang pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// 'dogs kyi sgra rnams gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sha ta ma le ka ra/ ga yi sgra las grub pa ni// gi gu yin par shes par bya// ra dang na las sgrub pa ni// na ro yin par shes par bya// nga yi sgra las sgrub pa ni// 'greng bu yin pa shes par bya// zha yi sgra las phul ba ni// zhabs bskyed dag tu rab tu bstan// ya yi sgra las sgrub pa ni// ya tag dag tu shes par bya// ra yi sgra las sgrub pa ni// ra ta'i sgra zhes bshad pa yin// a yi mig gi sgra yis ni// yi ge'i mig tu byung ba yin// dpung pa brtsegs dang rkang pa bshad// lag pa ber ka ris sgrub// ces gsungs so// sngon gangs

dkar gyi ltongs na srog chags mang po gnas so// srog chags dbyings su rab tu bshad// de nang sgrub pa'i srog chags ni// seng ge dkar mo zhes su grags// pha rkyen g.yu yi ral pa can// gzhan sel dbye las sogs pa'o// de ni sgra yi tshad ma'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ sgra'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la// log dang 'thug dang ring po dang// che dang thung ba'i yi ge dang// pho yig mo yig bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// Ta log rig pa rang grol lo// tha log thig le rang la shar// na log rtog pa rang sa zin// d+ha log dus gsum gcig tu rtogs// Na log mnyam nyid rang snang ngo// rang rang brtsegs pa 'thug po ste// thig le ye khyab rtsol med yin// gang la 'a brgyan ring po ste// ye shes rgyun chad med pa yin// gang la has brgyan chen po'i sgra// chos sku 'du 'bral med pa'o// hUM zhes bya ba thung ngu ste// chos min klong du 'dus pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ sgra rang so'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// de rnams sgrub byed sel ba rnams// go rim nges pa bstan du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'dren dang 'brel gcod mkhyen pa'i sgra// stod kyi grogs su shes par gyis// sdud dang 'brel dang khyab ba'i sgra// smad kyi grogs su shes par gyis// sgrub byed dbyings dang phan rkyen dang// gnod pa can sel tshad ma'i sgra// rang rang grogs kyi skabs su sbyar// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ 'dogs kyi sgra'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la// ye shes rgyal po rtog 'das pa'i// gnas lugs bdag la bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rang byung ye shes chos min la// rang rig ye shes sa le gsal// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis// snang srid stong gsum thig les khyab// 'brel khyab dwangs pa nam mkha'i dpe// chos las ma byung 'byung ba'i sems// rgyud las ma bsten ngo bo'i sku// lung dang ma 'brel kun khyab la// man ngag rtog ge'i tshad ma ci// mngon dang lkog gis don mi mthong// mngon sum 'khrul pa rang ga 'di// 'di nyid rang shar thig le yin// dkon gyur bar don 'di rang shar// sgom pas lkog gyur mun pa 'jil// mngon sum rang shar sgom mi dgos// tha snyad tshig gi

sgra las grol// nyams myong phyogs rtogs tshad ma ci// nyams grol gyur na tshad ma'i don// dbyer med stong par dbu ma'i sgra// phyogs cha ma grub phyogs med la// de ni thig le ye brdal yin// rgya mtsho dar dang rlabs nang chu// sprin dang char pa mkha' snang nyid// dug lnga rgyud drug thig ler brdal// ma rig pa nyid ye shes gzhi// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ gnas lugs rang shar gyi le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i rgyal// de yi lam ni bstan par zhu// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ma rtog ma rigs ma rtogs pas// de yi rang shar lam gyi mchog/ thun tshad gzung dang sems sgom rnams// de ni lam gyi gol sa yin// rang grol lam gyi rgyal po la// 'jug rtsol byed pa lam sgrib yin// gong du thob 'dod sgrib pa gnyis// de nyid ma shes gol pa yin// gol dang sgrib pa rang shar la// rang grol rang shar lam chen po// rig pa'i gsang lam bzhi shes nas// de ni rang grol rang byung yin// thig le chos min rang la gnas// rang gnas rdo rje gsang ba'i lam// 'pho ba dus kyi gdams ngag yin// 'pho ba rang grol mya ngan 'das// gzhan las ma byung rang las shar// zhes gsungs so// rnam rtog dug lnga ye shes lnga ru sprod// rgyu rkyen dpe las 'das par ma shes na// dpe las 'das pas don gyi dpe de 'gog/ dpe zla med pas nyag gcig po// ma bcos phung po rdzogs chen sku lngar rdzogs// spyan lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// a nu man chad dag las grol ba yi// rang sgo'i thig le'i ngo sprod rab tu gces// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ lam gyi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la// 'bras bu'i don ni ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// zhus pas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gnyis// spyi ni lkog gyur mun pa 'jil// ci phyir phyi dus 'debs pa'i phyir// log rtog phyi dus 'debs pa dang// phyogs rtogs phyi dus 'debs pa gnyis// 'khor ba rnam pa bzhi yin te// rgyu ltar 'khor ba mu stegs dang// ma rtogs pa yi 'bras bu'o// mtshan nyid sde gsum dkar por 'khor// mtho ris thar pa'i lam yang gnas// rgyu ltar 'khor ba thog ma'i dus// 'bras bu ltar 'khor gsang sngags pa// longs sku'i 'bras bu thob pa yin// dag pa yang dag ma dag gsum// yang dag 'bras bu yang dag gsum// snga ma phyi ma da lta gsum// sgom mkhan bsgom bya sgom dus gsum// spyod mkhan spyad bya spyod dus gsum// thob

mkhan thob bya thob dus gsum// gnas sa rtogs sa gol sa gsum// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// rang yin rang snang rang sgrol la// rang shar rang byung rang rig yin// dus gsum dbyer med chen po yin// bsre ba 'dres pa'i 'dres tshad gsum// rang sgo zang thal chos min gsum// ma rig gzung 'dzin chags sdang gsum// bag dang chags dang 'khor bar gsum// mtho ris ngan song rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas sems can spyi sa gsum// chos dang sdig pa slob dpon gsum// de gsum gang snga 'brel ba gces// zang thal dbyer med chos min gsum// shes rab ye shes thig le gsum// rang byung rang gnas rang rig gsum// nyi ma 'od dang zer dang gsum// byin dang rlabs dang rgyud pa gsum// ston pa bstan pa 'khor dang gsum// gnas dang dus dang chos dang gsum// lung dang rgyud dang man ngag gsum// sdig pa bag chags las dbang gsum// dge ba las dbang 'bras bu gsum// sgom pa brtan pa las 'bras gsum// thog ma tha ma bar do gsum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// tshul khrims sbyin sogs mi lus gsum// mtshams med dmyal ba'i las 'bras kun// 'khrul pa'i don dang gnas lugs gces// 'khrul ba 'khrul gzhi dngos po'i don// thams cad 'di ru shes par gyis// rang gzhi rang 'khrul rang dngos gsum// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// thams cad rang shar yin gyis de ltar shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ gnas lugs 'khrul ba 'bras bu'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis// thun mong dngos grub bstan pa ni// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang// rnal 'byor dam sri byed pa la// 'gal ba chan la dbab pa gsungs// de dag dgug par bya ba ni// rkang rjes sa dang ro ras la// rgya mtsho chu yis gzugs bris la// rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo la// de la gong dang 'dra bar bris// nub nas byung ba'i rlung mar la// nyi ma nub tu nye ba la// lcags kyus khrid nas dgu yi nub// rang gi 'og tu bcug gyur na// de dag khugs par gdon mi za// de nas gsad par bya ba ni// de yi nang par bton nas ni// dug gi shing bu sna tshogs dang// phur bu lcags phur snying khar gzugs// gnas lnga dag tu btab la bzhag/ gu gul dud pas myos su gzhug/ yungs kar dug chus yang yang bran// de nas gzugs de thig btab la// nyi shar dus tshod mtshon gyis gtubs// pho mo'i mtshan ma thad kar gtub// des ni snying 'gas 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnan pa'i las bya ste// rnga la sbrul dang sbal pa

g.yogs// rdo rje bya khyung thugs kar btags// rta mchog gtsug gi kha la'o// rang lus phyag na rdo rje'o// gong gi ling ga ming rus bcas// rnam snang dag dang bcas pa yis// ri lu brgya dang rtsa brgyad byas// chu mig re ru dor byas na// mnan gtad brgya dang rtsa brgyad yin// kha ral zhab mas rkang pa dkri// nyin mo nub nas mtshan mo 'dres// chu dang grib ma bstun par bya// de nas bskrad pa'i las bya na// rta dre'u gnyis kyi mtshul pa la// dgra yi ming rus gzugs su bri// nyi shu lnga la 'thab tu gzhug/ dug chus bran nas chu la ni// shar rlung dag dang bcas la bskur// des ni skrod par gdon mi za// dbye bar bya ba'i las dag ni// 'ug pa'i mgo dang bya rog mgo/ gnyis par ming rus gzugs byas la// dmar thag chad pa'i dus dag tu// thod pa gnyis po 'thab tu gzhug/ dgra bo dbye bar gdon mi za// bcing ba dag gis las bshad pa// gro ga'am yang na ro ras la// dgra yi ming rus gzugs su bri// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bsdams byas nas// zhags pa'i phyag rgyas sngon dmar bsdam// gu gul nag pos bdug par bya// nyin mtshan gung gi dus tshod la// rang gi rkang pas khrid nas ni// dong khung nang du bcug byas na// nges par 'gro mi shes par 'gyur// gal te skams pa'i las byas na// dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang// 'bru mar shing mar rab bsregs la// thod pa dum bu drug pa ru// dgra gzugs bcug la bzhag nas ni// dug gi tsher mas gzugs la dbug/ gong mas thod pa dgang bar bya// tsher ma'i me yis bskam byas la// dgra yi sgo 'am rgya ram mnan// nges par skams par 'gyur ba yin// zhes gsungs so// da ni brtul zhugs brtan par bya// pha dang khu bo mes po de// rab bstun myur du bsgral byas na// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal yang mthong// ma dang sring mo bu mo de// 'dod chags rab tu sbyar byas na// snang ba mtha' yas dngos grub thob// tshangs pa chen po'i tshe tshad thub// rdo rje slob dpon dag la ni// brdzun tshig sna tshogs smras pa na// nges par skye med dngos grub thob// rdo rje slob dpon ma mched lcam// gsad gcad tshig tu brjod pa ni// don yod grub pa'i dngos grub thob// khyim tshes slob ma'i nor brkus na// rin chen 'byung ldan dngos grub thob// rig pa brtul zhugs chen po byas// thig le nyag gcig dngos grub thob// rang rig ye shes brtul zhugs byas// 'gro drug rang grol dngos grub thob// snang ba rgya yan brtul zhugs spyad// skye ba med pa'i dngos grub thob// rig par rang grol brtul zhugs spyod// 'chi med rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// chos nyid 'od gsal brtul zhugs spyad// skye ba med pa'i dngos grub thob// 'khor

ba rang snang brtul zhugs spyad// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub thob// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi brtul zhugs spyad// theg pa chen po'i dngos grub thob// tshes brgyad srog la 'ug mig blangs// mig la byugs na mi med mthong// 'ug pa'i mig dang srin bya dang// byi ba'i mig gsum bsres byas la// mngar gsum dag la ri lu bya// srod la zla gcig sran tsam mur// mun pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// sa g.yos byung ba'i dus su ni// rang gi 'doms nas sa blangs te// gnas lngar gtor bar byas 'gyur na// tshe ni 'dab tu 'gyur ba'o// nyi ma shi ba'i dus dag tu// skyobs su 'gro byas 'chi las thar// chos ston sbyin pas phyug por 'gyur// snying rje skyes na sems bskyed na// tshe ring mtho ris thob par 'gyur// zla ba shi na'ang de bzhin no// mdo bton pas ni dgra las grol// lce spyang mig dang 'ug pa dang// byi la pha wang ri bong dang// nub mo mthong ba'i mig dag la// mngar gsum dang sbyar ri lu byas// gnam stong dag nas bzung nas su// zla ba gcig tu zos 'gyur na// skye ba snga phyi dran pa dang// mun pa'i 'jigs las grol bar 'gyur// chu yi byi ba sngon mo blangs// a mu ka yi dri chu dron mo blugs// g.yag po ru ru'i rang bcug na// dri chu 'gags nas 'chi bar 'gyur// rta dang dre'u khyi'i 'bras bu dang// mdzo dang rtol gyi mkhris par sbyar// dgra la byin na skye brgyud chad// skye ba snga phyi dran pa'i mig/ nub mo so sor 'chi ba'i snying/ u rings thod pa'i mig phyung nas// sla nga byi rling nang du btso// de zos rims nad thams cad thub// mi yi tshil bu rta tshal dang// khyi tshil rtsi bo che dang sbyar// gla rtsi mu zi sbyar byugs na// 'brum bu'i gdon dang sa bdag thub// ces gsungs so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ thun mong khyad par sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bskor ba lan mang du byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa kun gyi rje// bdag cag mkha' 'gro'i gas rnams la// 'dre rgyud chen po bshad pa legs// sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu thob// bdag cag rab tu yi rang ngo// mgon po gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyid kyis// 'gro ba rnams kyi don du gsungs pa yi// 'dre rgyud chen po bstan pa 'di// bdag gis legs par gzung bar bya// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// mkha' 'gro rnams la bka' stsal pa// yang gter bla na med pa'i chos// gsang ba bla na med pa mngon du gyur ba'i rgyud/ ngas khyod la bstan to// legs par bstan tau// rab tu legs par chongs shig/ legs par zung zhig/ bsgrub pa'i chos ma yin pa khong du chud par gyis shig/ ces gsungs nas/ mi mngon dbyings su gshegs

so// thig le 'dre rgyud chen po las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// yongs su gtad pa'i rdzogs so//// rgya rgya rgya/ thig le 'dre rgyud rin po che spungs pa zhes bya ba bla ma ngom bi was/ gu ru rnal 'byor pa ram rta 'dam la/ lho stag tshang ser ger brgyud/ des rnal 'byor pa la brgyud do// des sta ston brgyud do// a+thi+-i//// rgya gar skad du/ A r+ya many+dzu shrI a ti ti la tan tra ma hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal lta ba thod rgal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang/ 'khor gyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ mkha' 'gro rab tu mdzes ma nyi ma'i 'phreng ba dang thabs cig pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gnas ni chos kyi dbyings rgya ma chad pa zhes bya'o// bstan pa ni rab tu mdzes pa dri med 'byung ba'o// dus ni rang byung tshogs pa rang snang gi dus so// de'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po dang/ 'jam dpal dri ma med pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ lag na be con can dang/ don yod zhags pa dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ sgrol ma dang/ de dag la sogs pa'i gtso bo kun tu bzang po la bskor ba lan du ma byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ lha rdzas man da ra ba la sogs pa/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul lo// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// phyi yi mchod pa rin po che// snang srid rnam dag mchod pa phul// mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlab tu gsol// skye med rang snang dngos grub gsol// nang gi mchod pa rin po che// snang srid rnam dag mchod par 'bul// rang grol thig le'i dngos grub gsol// gsang ba'i mchod pa rin po che// rang byung bdud rtsi mchod par 'bul// rang snang ye shes dngos grub gsol// yang gsang mchod pa bla na med// tshe srog sbyor sgrol mchod par 'bul// thig le rang snang dngos grub gsol// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po la// 'jam dpal bdag la lta ba thod rgal zhu// mkha' 'gro ma yi mchod pa bzhes// zhes mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab phul// de yi byin gyis brlabs dag las// ti la tan tra ma hA zhes pa'i sgra// kun tu bzang po'i byin rlabs bstan// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas

rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang// dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro la sogs pas// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang// 'jam dpal dri med nyid la ni// lta ba thod rgal ji ltar lags// spyod pa thod rgal ji ltar lags// sgom pa thod rgal ji ltar lags// 'bras bu thod rgal ji ltar lags// go 'phang dbang la rag lus pas// dbang bskur thod rgal ji ltar lags// dam tshig thod rgal ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal dri ma med pa dang// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams legs par nyon// dri med dbang bskur bstan pa ni// rgyal po kun gyi 'byung gnas te// rgyal rigs chen pos dbang bskur bas// mtshan dang dpe byad rang las byung// nor bu rin chen mdzes pa de// mdzod spur shar bas mun pa choms// nor bu'i rang gdangs 'bar ba yis// nyin mo mtshan mo'i snang ba nub// ces brda bstan no// mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng ba des// kun tu bzang pos brda dgrol zhu// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rgyal po kun gyi 'byung gnas ni// chos sku rang la yod pa'i rtags// rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas// thig ler rang grol dbang gi rgyal po yin// mtshan dang dpe byad rang byung bas// chos sku'i dbang thob sku gnyis 'byung// nor bu rin chen mdzes pa ni// thugs rje'i byin rlabs phyogs med yin// mdzod spur shar bas mun choms pa// thig le rang grol 'khor ba grol// nor bu rang 'od 'bar ba de// rang byung ye shes khong nas shar// nyin mtshan med par gsal ba de// chos min ye shes zang thal yin// dbang bskur rgyal po rang byung dbang// lam gyi rgyal po ye shes sku// rlung dang thig le rtsa gsum po// lhan cig skyes pa dbang gi rtags// de yi bskur thabs rang byung dbang// de yi thob tshul rang rig dbang// rang dbang yin pas gzhan mi tshol// rang byung dbang gi rgyal po yin// rang la dbang bas gsang dbang yin// ma lus 'du 'bral med par shes// de ni thabs kyi dbang bskur yin// rig pa snang ba rang grol shes// de ni shes rab dbang bskur yin// rang la rdzogs pas bum pa'i dbang// tshig gcig bstan pas dbang thob pa// de ni tshig dbang rin po che// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams kyis ni// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po lags// dam tshig bsrung lugs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro 'khor tshogs rnams// blon po kun gyi bshes gnyen la// seng ge dkar mo'i rta yod de// blon pos zhon nas phyin pa la// seng ge rtsal gsum

rdzogs pa yin// gom pa gcig la sa gcad pas// blon pos skad cig sa gcad pas// blon pos skad cig don sar sleb// ces brda gsungs so// blon po kun gyi bshes gnyen ni// bla mas rang byung ye shes ston// seng ge dkar mo'i rta po ni// dper na rin chen man shel ltar// dam tshig sel med rang byung bas// de ni dam tshig rtsa ba yin// blon pos de la zhon pa ni// rang byung ye shes rang gis bsrungs// seng ge rtsal gsum rdzogs pa ni// chos sku rang snang rdo rje 'dra// de las 'das ni 'tshig par 'gyur// longs sku rang snang pad+ma 'dra// de las 'das ni 'ching bar 'gyur// sprul sku rang snang rin chen 'dra// de las 'das na brlag par 'gyur// gom pa gcig gis sa gcad pa// chos sku rtsod bral dam tshig yin// skad cig don sar sleb pa ni// ma bsrungs mi 'da'i dam tshig thub cing bsrung du grol// dam tshig shel gyi 'phreng ba 'di// thams cad dri med zang thal la// nyams dang bskang ba bya mi dgos// ci ste rang la mi 'da' bas// rgyal po rang rtags dam tshig yin// rin chen shel gyi 'phreng ba yin// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig shel 'phreng lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig shel 'phreng gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i 'phreng bas// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po la// lta ba thod rgal gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal dang// nang gi lta ba thod rgal dang// sbas pa bla na med pa'o// de ni nga yis bstan par bya// legs par nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal ni// snang ba rang grol ngo bo'i sku// rgyu rkyen med pas mkha' ltar gsal// rang byung chos sku kho na la// lta ba stong nyid thod rgal bas// 'od gsal chos nyid don gyis 'phags// gnyen po med pas rang byung sku// nam mkha' gdangs dang chas pa ltar// rang byung chos sku 'od las grol// rang snang thig les khyab pas na// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal yin// 'byung ba skyes pa bud med sogs// rgya mtsho dar dang rlabs sna bzhin// thig le dag las 'das pa ni// phra rab rdul yang mi rnyed do// lta ba thod rgal rang byung shar// stod kyis byung bas rtse mor phyin// nyi zla brtsegs pas grib ma med// 'og ma'i grub mtha' yas rgal bas// seng ge dkar mos 'og rta byed// theg dgu'i rtse mor phyin pa yin// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ phyi lta ba thod rgal gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsol ba/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po lags// nang gi lta ba thod rgal ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// me long

g.ya' dang bral ba la// ji ltar gnas pa'i gzugs snang ngo// tshogs drug rang snang gsal ba 'di// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma skyed pas// lha la sogs pa'i rigs lnga kun// rang snang thabs su grol tsam na// sku gsum brtsegs pa'i rtse mor phyin// spyan snga rang sa'i rgya las grol// ye shes mig gcig rtse mo sleb// mthong bya yul de rang grol bas// sangs rgyas sdud pa rin po che// dbang bskur brtsegs pa dbang gi mchog/ dbang mchog rang byung thig ler brdal// 'byung ba lnga dang rigs lnga 'od// dug lnga la sogs snang ba kun// 'khyags pa'i dus na chu nyid la// chu nyid 'khyags pa'i ngo bor snang// rang snang chu yi thod rgal yin// 'byung ba lnga sogs gang snang ba// rang snang thig ler rang byung yin// rang byung ston pas thod rgal yin// spyan gsum rnam dag rgal ba de// ye shes mig gcig thod rgal yin// dug gi rgyal po ngo bo yis// dug nad can la btang gyur na// dug gi nad las grol bar 'gyur// ji ltar tshogs drug rang sar bzhag/ 'khor ba'i nad las grol bar 'gyur// ma bcings pa ni chos min sku// ma bslad pas na ye shes te// ma sgrubs pas na 'bras bu'o// lta ba gol bas thod rgal min// rang sa ma shes man ngag min// 'dus byas 'bras bu gnas skabs chos// ma byas rang sar ma shes na// lta ba thod rgal dam tshig nyams// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ nang lta ba'i thod rgal gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro rnams la bka' stsal pa// sbas pa'i lta ba 'di lta ste// btsun mo bde ba skyong ma la// mtshan mo skyes pa brgyad khri dang// bzhi stong dag gis chags pa spyad// slar la 'dod pa skyes nas su// ji tsam spyad kyang ma tshim nas// slar la bde ba tshol du phyin// yul ni glang chen rin chen gling// gser gyi nyi ma bya ba yod// de na mtshan mos stong gsum sleb// sdun du su byung rang sar sbyor// de dang mo gnyis phrad pa las// pho mtshan mthong bas yid 'byung ngo// de bde don ni 'di lta ste// btsun mo kun gzhi sbyangs ma la// skyes pa nyon mongs brgyad khri dang// bzhi stong las gyur pa yi// chags pa 'khor ba'i snang ba'o// slar 'dod skyes pa 'gro ba drug/ ji tsam 'khor kyang mi grol te// skye shi zo zhing rgyud nas tshol// chos nyid klong chen sku gsum gnas// 'gyur med ye shes gser lta bu// phyi nang med pas kun tu khyab// bla mas don bstan rang la shar// rang shar ye shes ngo shes pas// rang sgo mthong bas zhe 'dod med// tshogs drug rol pa rang grol las// ye shes thig le rgyun chad med// chags sdang 'dod yon 'ub chub kun// rtse gcig dgongs pa rang sar sleb// thig le brtsegs

pa'i rtse mo na// rang byung ye shes chos min la// lta ba thod rgal rdo rje brtsegs// chags sdang rang byung rang grol bas// nyams myong drod rtags rang sar grol// gal te gser 'dod rnyed pa la// gser 'dod sla ba dag la rten// me nyid 'dod pas med dang phrad pa na// du ba'i rnam pa med stong mi 'gyur// rang grol thod rgod rang shar bas// lta rtogs stong pa nyid la rag ma lus// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ gsang lta'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// bla med thod rgal bstan gyis nyon// ces gsungs so// de la ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// lta ba stong pa'i yul las grol// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba kun gyi mes po yin// rang byung thig ler rang shar bas// lta ba kun gyi mes po yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// snang srid kun gyi mes po yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas// rgyal ba yab yum mes po yin// sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// de med rnam rtog ma grub pas// sems can mes po yin// rtog pa grol ba'i yul med pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin// rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung bas// 'dus ma byas kyi mes po yin// snang srid 'khor 'das pa'i gdams// snang srid kun gyi mes po yin// 'bras bu thod rgal yul med rang grol yin// spyod pa thod rgal snang srid gzhi bzhengs yin// bsam gtan thod rgal bying rgod rtsal gcod yin// lam rnams thod rgal rang snang rnam dag yin// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ bla med thod rgal gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// ston pa kun tu bzang po lags// spyod pa thod rgal gsung bar zhu// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng// spyod pa thod rgal bstan pa na// ma byas spyod pa rang byung thod rgal ni// phyi nang 'od la spyod shes na// longs sku rang gdangs phyogs med spyod// spyod pa rang shugs la shar// ma bkag rang byung spyod pa thod rgal yin// rang snang lus skye med spyod shes na// chos sku rang phyogs med spyod// spyod mkhan rang snang spyod yul grol// ma bsgrubs rang shar spyod pa thod rgal yin// gsang snang 'gyu ba yid dag la// rang shar spyod pa sprul sku khong nas shar// spyad rgyu+u rang gdangs 'od gsal phyogs ris med// spyod pa thod rgal cir snang sprul pa'i sku// thams cad spyod par shar bas 'khrul pa'i mig ma thogs// spyod pa thod rgal thabs la re mi ltos// rang grol thabs la mi brten pas// spyod

pa thod rgal zhes su bshad// ces gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ spyod pa thabs la ma byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// sgom pa thod rgal gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng// sgom pa thod rgal bstan pa ni// sgom nyams las thod rgal bas// rang byung ye shes kun tu brdal// sgom mkhan 'gyu bar rang gdangs bas// rang rig ye shes khong nas shar// sgom rgyu'i gdams ngag thod rgal bas// lhag mthong rang byung khong nas shar// sgom pa'i yul med thod rgal bas// gnyis med ye shes khong nas 'bar// sgom pa'i 'bras bu thod rgal bas// thig le nyag gcig khong nas 'bar// nyams myong thod rgal bying rmugs med// ye shes thod rgal snang srid thig le 'bar// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ sgom pa thod rgal gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// 'bras bu thod rgal bstan pa ni// 'bras bu thod rgal rnams spyod dus las grol// re dogs thod rgal rang snang thig ler 'bar// snang srid thod rgal bar do'i yul las grol// 'khor 'das thod rgal thig le rang sa zin// bar mtshams thod rgal thig le gcig bzhag sku// thob mkhan thod rgal yul med rang la shar// thob rgyu thod rgal ye nas rang sar grol// thob bya thod rgal snang srid thig ler brdal// phyi nang med pas nyag gcig yin// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgyal gyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i rang sgo'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro mas bskor ba du ma byas nas/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal dri ma med pa lta ba thod rgal bstan pas/ bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo// sdud pa po 'jam dpal dri ma med pa/ zhu ba po mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'phreng bas zhus pa/ lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya rgya rgya/ gsang ngo//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni tra tha thi la du ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin gyi ni byin gyis brlabs// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i sku// bde gshegs kun gyi ngo bo'i sku// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// phyogs lhung med pa'i dgongs pa shar// rang gi dgongs pa ma bcos ngang// bya btsal med pa'i klong du khyab// khyab par rang byung sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' rang byung sku// bde gshegs kun gyi gtso bo sku// sku mdog dkar po gangs ri 'dra// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// ye shes

lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags// g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags// sku stod dar dkar rgyan gsol ba// yon tan kun dang ldan pa'i rtags// sku smad ba ti tsi gu ni// nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos rtags// de yi ngang las rang byung ba// sprul sku phyag na rdo rje ni// sku mdog ljang khu'i 'od zer lnga// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu ni// sa dgu rang sar non pa'i rtags// g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa ni// gsang yum dbyings na gnas pa'i rtags// na bza' ljang khu gsol ba ni// 'phrin las 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal mdog mthing khar bstan pa ni// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags// bde gshegs de yi byin brlabs las// mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga sprul te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku mdog dkar// rdo rje rang rtags sdigs mdzub dang// lcags kyu thogs nas 'gro ba 'dren// dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro sku mdog ser// rdo rje zhags pas rnam rtog 'ching// dam tshig mkha' 'gro lcags sgrog gis// gzung 'dzin 'ching zhing 'gro ba sgrol// las kyi mkha' 'gro sku mdog dmar// rdo rje lcags sgrog rnam rtog sdom// sha za'i mkha' 'gro'i sku mdog ljang// rdo rje dril bu sdug bsngal 'joms// ye shes mkha' 'gro sku mdog mthing// rdo rje thod khrag 'khor ba rngub// gtso bo mkha' 'gro rnams la ni// las byed mkha' 'gro mang pos bskor// dam nyams chad pa gcod par byed// kun tu bzang po'i chos skyong ma// rdo rje dza ti ral pa can// g.yas na spu gri g.yon na ban d+ha'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma tshogs rnams// sha za khrag 'thung 'khor gyis bskor// bde gshegs de yi byin brlabs las// ma gcig mkha' 'gro drag mo yi// lhums nas dga' rab rdo rje sprul// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rab tu dgyes// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs rnams kyis// drag po lta stangs thog 'bebs zhus// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// drag po kun 'dul ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad zhus// drag po drag mo 'dul ba yi// thabs mchog bla med nga yis bshad// ces gsungs so// phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// bdag cag mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// de yi 'dul ba'i chos zhu 'tshal// zhes zhus pa/ he he rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// ye shes rgyal po thog 'bebs 'di// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la nga yis bshad// rtse gcig nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// za 'og gur khyim bla re la// ri mo'i rnam pa bsam yas kyang// bsdus pas za 'og gur khyim yin// kha dog sna tshogs 'ja' gsal ba// chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i

sku// 'du 'bral med na dgongs pa yin// 'khor ba rang byung 'gro drug 'di// thig le ye shes gzugs snang yin// dmyal ba'i me lce 'bar ba dang// rang snang 'khrul pa'i ngo bo ni// chos sku thig le rang snang yin// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs dang// sprul sku thub pa drug po ni// 'gro drug drang phyir lung bstan yin// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' de// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying la gnas// chos sku kun tu bzang po de// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gtsug na gnas// sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje de// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdun na gnas// mkha' 'gro rig pa'i ye shes de// chos min rtsol sgrub blo las grol// lta ba thod rgal nyam nga med// spyod pa thod rgal thabs snang grol// sgom pa blo grol ye shes shar// 'bras bu rang byung lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes thog tu dbab gsung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// he he ston pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// bdag cag mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams la// dri med ye shes thog 'bebs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sngon klu'i rgyal po dga' bo yis// drang srong dri med bltar phyin pas// shel gyi sgo khang nang du tshud// nor bu rin chen de ru rnyed// nor bu de la 'od byung bas// 'dod pa sna tshogs de ru grub// bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin te// dri med ye shes zang thal de// ngo shes pa yis dri med sha// rang byung ye shes dri med rnyed// yon tan phyogs med rang snang bas// chos kyi spros pa de ru chod// ces gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes dri med rang chas su bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la// sbyor sgrol mchod pa dbul lags na// bzhes te dngos grub bdag la stsol// gzugs la rnam gsum zhes bya ba// de nyid chos skur sbyor sgrol nas// gzugs kyi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan spyan la mchod par 'bul// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// de nyid longs skur sbyor sgrol nas// sgra yi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan snyan la mchod par 'bul// ro la rnam gsum shes byas te// de nyid sprul skur sbyor sgrol na// ro yi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan ljags la mchod par 'bul// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru sbyor sgrol te// dri la dbang ba'i mchog yin te// bcom ldan shangs la mchod par 'bul// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru sbyor sgrol te// dri la dbang ba'i mchog yin te// bcom ldan shangs la mchod par 'bul// reg la

rnam gsum shes byas te// mngon byang sku ru sbyor sgrol nas// reg gi dbang mchog dam pa yin// sku la mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol// yid la rnam gsum shes byas te// de nyid ye shes sku ru sbyor zhing sgrol// yid la mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ sbyor sgrol mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor maN+Dal dbul ba ni// 'byung lnga dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// rin chen sna bdun tshom bu bkod// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin brlabs na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dbul// skye med dngos grub stsal du gsol// rtsa 'dab lnga yis dkyil 'khor du// thig le rlung gi sa tshon la// rang byung ye shes sa tshon bkod// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dbul// rang byung dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor maN+Dal phul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni// snang srid tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang byung bdud rtsi sna tshogs gsog/ gnyis su med pa'i chos sku rdzogs// gnyis med rang byung 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la bskor// skye ba med pa 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la 'bul// rang lus tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang rig sku lnga ye sogs la// dbyer med rang grol thig ler rdzogs// rang rig rang shar 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la bskor// rang byung dag pa'i dngos grub gsol// si ra tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang rig ye shes lha mthong tshogs// rang snang dag pa'i 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' che la 'bul// rang snang rang grol dngos grub stsol// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// rang la rang byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i gtso// sha dang khrag dang rus pa med// chu yi zla ba lta bu'i sku// skyon med dri ma rnam par dag/ nyi ma'i 'od bas gsal zhing 'tsher// byin brlabs mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// rnam dag pad+ma'i sku lta bu'i// 'ja' tshon dang ba ltar mdzes pa// 'gro mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams tshur nyon dang// nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// skye 'chi med pa'i byin gyis brlabs// nga ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// 'gyur ba med pa'i byin gyis brlabs// nga ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// dri med dag par byin gyis rlobs// nga ni las kyi

mkha' 'gro ste// rang grol 'ub chub byin gyis brlabs// nga ni dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ste// ye shes rang snang byin gyis brlabs// rang rig rang byung byin rlabs 'di// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra// rang las byung ba'i byin rlabs 'di// nam mkha'i dkyil nas glog 'gyu 'dra// rang las 'bar ba'i ye shes 'di// ha li 'bar la me byung 'dra// rang la snang ba'i thig le 'di// me mar 'od dang chas pa 'dra// rang las shar ba'i zang thal 'di// bar snang 'ja' tshon dwangs pa 'dra// rang las byung ba'i 'gyu ba 'di// bu chung skad dang chas pa 'dra// rang la rdzogs pa'i sku lnga 'di// dkyil 'khor gsal dang chas pa 'dra// rang las shar ba'i byin rlabs 'di// man shel 'od dang chas pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ rang las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// ston pa spyan sngar dgongs pa phul ba ni// mkha' 'gro med pa'i sngon rol na// lta sgom spyod pa'i ming yang med// 'bras bu rang grol bar mtshams med// mkha' 'gro med pa'i sngon rol na// 'byung ba lnga po ye nas med// rang byung dbyings kyi dgongs pa bstan// rgyun chad med na lam gyi mchog/ bar chad med na 'bras bu 'phags// snang srid rang gsal gzhi las grol// 'khor ba
